scripts.prepare: if [ ! -d "protobufs" ]; then git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/SteamDatabase/Protobufs.git protobufs; fi && if [ ! -d "SteamKit" ]; then git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/SteamRE/SteamKit.git; fi && if [ ! -d "protobuf_gen" ]; then mv SteamKit/Resources/ProtobufGen protobuf_gen; fi && if [ ! -d "steam_language" ]; then mv SteamKit/Resources/SteamLanguage steam_language; fi && rm -rf SteamKit
